title: Les voyages de Nicky
overview: This summer, Karl Sanchez, better known by their stage name Nicky Doll, the famous drag queen, is taking us on adventures that are by turns moving, surprising, extravagant... and of course LEGENDARY!A journey that will take her to India, Greece, Mexico and Japan to meet those who, like her, question gender throughout the world. The opportunity to rediscover these countries with a fresh perspective, thanks to inspiring, exciting personalities, who embody both the passing on of ancestral customs and reveal to us an infinite number of ways of being a man, a woman... or other !
